desc: Berry Trucking carries and recommends Primrose Oil Products. Whether it's for diesel or gasoline fuel additives that prevent phase separation, fuel plugging on fuel filters, and carboxylate buildup. Keep your rig running efficiently, without loss of power, and reduce part replacement.

layout.text: MODERN ENGINE AND INJECTORS HAVE IMPROVED TOLERANCES
CARBOXYLATES AND ASPHALTENES REDUCE PERFORMANCE AND FUEL ECONOMY
INCREASE PERFORMANCE AND INCREASE PART LIFE
